tool.name: Lingpipe Sentence Splitter
tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds annotations for sentence boundaries using the `LingPipe <http://alias-i.com/lingpipe-3.9.3/>`_ sentence splitter .
**Required annotations**
* `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_
**Generated annotations**
* A new view containing `Sentence <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Sentence.html>`_ annotations. (LIF)
